text: The Yangon Region Transport Authority (YRTA; ) is the operating transit agency for Yangon Region, Myanmar. It was formed on 8 July 2016. YRTA currently operates Yangon Bus Service, which began operations on 15 January 2017. ==References== Category:2016 establishments in Myanmar Category:Transport organisations based in Myanmar Category:Transport authorities Category:Organizations established in 2016
title: Yangon Region Transport Authority
